term: How is nullification doctrine never pushed fully?
content:
ultimately, however, it is not going to be invoked because every time it attaches itself to an issue, we resolve the issue in the crisis and (luckily) never push the nullification doctrine to its extreme

the first time it gets put into effect and we challenge it, Lincoln says “yeah you can’t do that” which is going to start the civil war
(may be extra info)
